website_summaries.verdict: A cute beach bag with a trendy chevron design. Available in four colors.
pros: The bag features long comfortable straps for easy transport and a thick canvas exterior
Zipper closure for its one large compartment
Includes a single pocket on the outside of the bag for little accessories
cons: Lacks a small interior zippered pocket

customer_reviews.title: Great, big bag.
customer_reviews.text: So it didn't come with the key fob or whatever that black thing is but this bag is really pretty awesome. Very large. Big enough to fit towels, flip flops, snacks, beach toys, etc. The way the top closes is great too. It has a lot of extra room at the top and it actually held more stuff than another, bigger bag I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: SMWW

customer_reviews.title: It's Big, which is exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Good zip and fabric quality. I just wanted a BIG beach bag and this fits the bill. It's lasted very well so far too, I feel the quality is very good for the price. I can fit about four normal bath towels or two beach towels and one bath towel, goggles, food, water bottle and little items etc ...it fits plenty. Good bag. Would love it in more fashionable prints but this is pretty ok too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very big bag. It was perfect as a carry on bag. If fit all my stuff and stuff for my two kids. It would be an awesome beach/lake bag. It will hold 2 to 3 towels along with whatever else you need to take with you. It has a small outside pocket at the bottom of the bag. Perfect for keys or cell phone. I've had it for 4 months with heavy use and it is still holding up great
customer_reviews.author: S. Wood

customer_reviews.title: great for keys or goggles (I put 3 pairs in ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag hold 3 Costco large beach towels with a little room, probably could get 1 more in I am hoping 2 more would fit, don't know yet. It also has a little zippered pocket near the bottom, great for keys or goggles (I put 3 pairs in it currently).
customer_reviews.author: D Fendrich

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Bag
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the XL Beach Tote Chevron Print Weekender Bag (Blue) and received this cheap all-mesh black bag. There is a random carabiner with the bag and the plastic wrap bag with the bar code read (XL Beach Tote Chevron Print..nalized (Blank, Navy Blue)). I have left a review with the seller and I hope I receive the bag I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great beach bag! Large enough for everything (towels, snacks, clothes etc) Very happy with this purchase and good price point for being a durable beach bag.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great bag to take to the lake every weekend! It holds SO MUCH!! I really like that I can fit everything for the boat in one bag. It is easy to clean and fold away nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It's big and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to use at the beach. I love it! It's big and sturdy. I can put 5 pretty large towels in it, several bottles of sunscreen, and books with room to spare. The only thing I wish it had was inside pockets but honestly, for the price, I can't complain. I'd buy this bag again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Maui or Bust and It Didn't Bust
customer_reviews.text: We took this to Maui and used it for two solid weeks. It went everywhere and held towels, drinks, extra shirts/shorts and even a couple hats. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: dstouten

customer_reviews.title: The money is worth!
customer_reviews.text: Love love this bag! Is big enough to put 4 towels ,clothes, water and snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice and big
customer_reviews.text: holds so much. great for going to the beach !
customer_reviews.author: Deanna H

customer_reviews.title: I can easily fit pool stuff for myself and my two kids ...
customer_reviews.text: I can easily fit pool stuff for myself and my two kids in this bag. Only complaint is that the straps slip off my shoulders when carrying the bag, but it is a small price to pay to be able to carry all our stuff in a bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beach bag!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. I had 2 large beach towels, sunscreen extra clothes and still had room for more.
customer_reviews.author: Megan White

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag for the pool or beach. Lightweight yet sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen in NY

customer_reviews.title: Super beach tote!
customer_reviews.text: Love this beach tote! Roomy enough for 6 x-large beach towels plus all your lotions and beach toys. Sand does not stick to bottom, and handles are good and strong. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kay L.

customer_reviews.title: NOT water resistant
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very spacious, and the handles are sturdy. It is not very resistant to water, though. If the bag gets wet, the items inside become wet. Would not recommend this bag to be used for the beach or a pool bag.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: I’d purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: I would buy this bag again! Bought it for our cruise and it held of our beach stuff and then used it on our way home to hold souvenirs.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Poor Zipper Construction
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bag. It’s big and roomy, has a nice look, just what I needed however after the 3rd maybe 4th usage, the zipper broke. The end came apart and zipper just zipped right off the track. Such a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for family of four!!
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves the bag and fits all our pool towels and supplies - great summer buy!!
customer_reviews.author: David Lewkowicz

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely a big bag, but its exactly what I needed. Used it as a carry on. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: sandi danziger

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Used it as a gift bag/part of the gift. It was cute enough for that and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Great while it ladted
customer_reviews.text: Great while it lasted it was nice and big and sturdy took it on a trip to Cancun with the family. The zipper broke on the second day.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Flores

customer_reviews.title: Wife is happy everybody happy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome beach bag for the wife even though I have to carry it.
customer_reviews.author: Javi_manrique

customer_reviews.title: Good sized bag for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a weekend trip to the beach. Good sized bag for a good price!
customer_reviews.author: C. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Fits all my beach necessities perfectly with lots of room. Love the front pocket to put our phones keys and any valuables. Used it a few times so far. Easy on the shoulder as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and wonderful size . I love it !
customer_reviews.author: Gdee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great beach bag.. fits at least 4 large towels, sun blocks and my son's puddle jumper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is great for the pool
customer_reviews.text: This bag was exactly what I was looking for. It is great for the pool.
customer_reviews.author: K.T.

customer_reviews.title: top Zipper came off first use
customer_reviews.text: larger bag than I expected which is good!!! Wow, so nice and perfect for toting stuff to beach, lake, pool, vacation! Update, used bag for the first time and the top zipper came off, too bad I really like this bag. I am returning. I bought again after the zipper situation and haven't had a problem with the zipper since. maybe it was a fluke
customer_reviews.author: Ajoneil

customer_reviews.title: as well as a beach bag I like the zip pocket up front
customer_reviews.text: Took it on a trip to Mexico and used it as a carry on on the plane to store my books, jacket food etc, as well as a beach bag I like the zip pocket up front. Handles are very sturdy and well sewn on the bag. There's even some small padding area on the straps to ease the pressure on shoulders. I use this for my daily activities when I have to lug a lot of stuff with me. It's very sturdy overall and looks real nice. Doesn't look cheap at all. I carry it with pride cause it's real nice looking. I like the blue color.
customer_reviews.author: Pompadom

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very large, roomy bag. Washes well too! Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey White

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broken after being used one time!
customer_reviews.text: Bag was used one time and the zipper is completely torn from the bag itself preventing it from being zipped closed. This was the 1st use which was simply to a pool and all the bag had in it was 2 towels and a pair of goggles. I would not recommend this item at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag but quite large.
customer_reviews.text: The bag quality is good and the bag is nice looking. I wish I had purchased the smaller size. It is really too big for me. I
customer_reviews.author: El

product_meta.title: XL Beach Tote Chevron Print Weekender Bag with Mesh Webbed Handles and Outer Zippered Pocket Can Be Personalized (Blank, Navy Blue)
product_meta.description:
CHEVRON PRINT BEACH AND TRAVEL TOTE BAG – The great bag for a day at beach, poolside, or weekend traveling This large tote effortlessly doubles as a cruise bag, travel and vacation overnight bag, sports and gym bag, pool and beach bag, or even a carry-on luggage handbag that can easily be stored under seat or in the overhead bin. 
,
FEATURES- A REALLY BIG BAG - 24 Inches across the top of the bag
COMFORTABLE STRAPS - Long lighted padded shoulder straps 
ZIPPERED TOP - Full zipper closure at top 
FRONT POCKET - Easy to access zippered front pocket
DURABLE - Polyester canvas with webbed straps will last for years

CUSTOM PERSONALIZATION IS AVAILABLE 
Choose from many Embroidered Monogram Styles or an Embroidered Name. 
Embroidery Area for Name is Approximately 2 inches tall by 5 inches wide
Embroidery Area for Monogram is Approximately 3 inches tall by 4 inches wide
Please note that personalized products are not refundable or exchangeable, Carefully input the correct name or monogram
feature_bullets: BEACH AND TRAVEL TOTE BAG – The great bag for a day at beach, poolside, or weekend traveling This large tote effortlessly doubles as a cruise bag, travel and vacation overnight bag, sports and gym bag, pool and beach bag, or even a carry-on luggage handbag that can easily be stored under seat or in the overhead bin.

PERSONALIZE IT - Available with Monogram or Name professionally embroidered. The monogram is approximately 4 inches by 3 inches and the name is 5 inches long by 2 inches tall. This x-large bag makes a great personal gift for yourself, friends, teachers, or family.

SPACIOUS AND FUNCTIONAL - This classy tote bag can make your day while packing for a day at the beach or a weekend away. Thanks to its huge storage capacity and convenient size (24” x 16” x 7”) this bag allows you to carry all your essentials in one spacious and stylish bag. The top zipper closure will keep items in the bag instead or falling out when sitting down

COMFORTABLE TO CARRY – The padded tote handles have a long drop of 11 inches, making this bag easy and very pleasant to throw on your shoulder and carry. A 10” x 4” outer pocket with zipper closure keeps your phone, keys, sunglasses, sunscreen, and other valuables safe and easily accessible.

DURABLE - This beach tote is made of high-quality polyester canvas material. This high-quality bag has been made with reinforced stitching to ensure long-term durability. The bag weighs just under 1 pound and folds up for easy storage or packing. Nylon lined interior.
